name: Drawiseum
description:
Controls:

WASD for Blue to Move

Arrow Keys for Red to Move

Left Shift for Blue to Draw

Space Bar for Red to Draw

9 to reset the game

I created this game during a game jam in the class Intro to Game Development. I served on a team of four as a designer and programmer. We created this game in Unity, and I created the pen art assets in Illustrator.
